WARNING: This Message Is From an External Sender. Should you have any doubt, click on the report button in Outlook.

________________________________

 

Dear Aeroll,

 

 

Thanks for your email however your TPL is not compliant.

 

 

The aggregate needs to be removed from the EL, also requires Additional insured, Primary insurance clause, Waiver of Subrogation and Cross Liability clause.

 

 

*	Additional Insured

 

The Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest

 

*	Primary Insurance Clause

 

It is understood and agreed that this Policy provides primary cover for the insured and that in the event of loss, damage or liability covered by this Policy which is also covered either in whole or in part under any other policy or policies effected by or on behalf of any of these parties comprising the insured, the insurer will indemnify the insured as if such other policy or policies of insurance are not in force.

 

*	Waiver of Subrogation East

 

The Insurers waive all rights of subrogation against the Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest.

 

 

*        Cross Liability Clause

The Insurers waive all rights of subrogation against the Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest.

 

 

*        Cross Liability Clause

 

For the purpose of this Policy, each of the Insured named in the Schedule shall be considered as a separate and distinct unit and the words “the Insured” shall be considered as applying to each of these Insured in the same manner as if a separate Policy had been issued to each of these Insured and the Company hereby agrees to waive all rights of subrogation or action which the Company may have or acquire against either of these Insured arising out of any accident in respect of which claim is made.

 

Looking forward in receiving the amended TPL and rest of the policies.

 

 

 

Regards,

Alya Al Ameeri

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance for unit is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 1 July 2025

Third Party Liability Expired 30 June 2025

Worksmen Compensation Expired 30 June 2025

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

We write further to our email to you dated 12 August 2024 reminding you to send us renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above, which has still not been received.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows.

Workmen’s Compensation and Employer’s Liability – Waiver of Subrogation wording should be correct.

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.  This may include some or all of the following:

 

1.	Incurring penalties under the Lease.
2.	Termination of the Lease.
3.	Closure of the retail unit and disruption to trade.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

In the event that you fail to provide us with renewed compliant insurance within seven (7) days’ of this email, then we will have to pass this matter to our Legal department.

 

We reserve all of our rights under the Lease and all Applicable Law.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/HgixCE6noUBMZAyFYS2i7rQX8?domain=urldefense.com>

We write further to our email to you dated 8 July 2024 reminding you to send us renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above, which has still not been received.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 30 June 2024 - Unit and Storage

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.  This may include some or all of the following:

 

1.	Incurring penalties under the Lease.
2.	Termination of the Lease.
3.	Closure of the retail unit and disruption to trade.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

In the event that you fail to provide us with renewed compliant insurance within seven (7) days’ of this email, then we will have to pass this matter to our Legal department.

 

We reserve all of our rights under the Lease and all Applicable Law.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

________________________________

 

Dear Aeroll

 

Your insurance expired on 30 June 2024 and we note that we have yet to receive renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 30 June 2024

Third Party Liability Expired 30 June 2024

Workmen’s Compensation and Employer’s Liability Expired 30 June 2024

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Rebecca

WARNING: This Message Is From an External Sender. Should you have any doubt, click on the report button in Outlook.

________________________________

 

Dear Aeroll,

 

 

Thanks for your email however your TPL is not compliant.

 

 

The aggregate needs to be removed from the EL, also requires Additional insured, Primary insurance clause, Waiver of Subrogation and Cross Liability clause.

 

 

*         Additional Insured

 

The Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest

 

*         Primary Insurance Clause

 

It is understood and agreed that this Policy provides primary cover for the insured and that in the event of loss, damage or liability covered by this Policy which is also covered either in whole or in part under any other policy or policies effected by or on behalf of any of these parties comprising the insured, the insurer will indemnify the insured as if such other policy or policies of insurance are not in force.

 

*         Waiver of Subrogation East

 

The Insurers waive all rights of subrogation against the Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest.

 

 

*        Cross Liability Clause

The Insurers waive all rights of subrogation against the Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest.

 

 

*        Cross Liability Clause

 

For the purpose of this Policy, each of the Insured named in the Schedule shall be considered as a separate and distinct unit and the words “the Insured” shall be considered as applying to each of these Insured in the same manner as if a separate Policy had been issued to each of these Insured and the Company hereby agrees to waive all rights of subrogation or action which the Company may have or acquire against either of these Insured arising out of any accident in respect of which claim is made.

 

Looking forward in receiving the amended TPL and rest of the policies.

 

 

 

Regards,

Alya Al Ameeri

We would like to take this opportunity to remind you to renew this on time and provide us with a copy as soon as you have done so.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Rebecca

We write further to our email to you dated 12 August 2024 reminding you to send us renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above, which has still not been received.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows.

Workmen’s Compensation and Employer’s Liability – Waiver of Subrogation wording should be correct.

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.  This may include some or all of the following:

 

1.	Incurring penalties under the Lease.
2.	Termination of the Lease.
3.	Closure of the retail unit and disruption to trade.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

In the event that you fail to provide us with renewed compliant insurance within seven (7) days’ of this email, then we will have to pass this matter to our Legal department.

 

We reserve all of our rights under the Lease and all Applicable Law.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive

We write further to our email to you dated 8 July 2024 reminding you to send us renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above, which has still not been received.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 30 June 2024 - Unit and Storage

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.  This may include some or all of the following:

 

1.	Incurring penalties under the Lease.
2.	Termination of the Lease.
3.	Closure of the retail unit and disruption to trade.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

In the event that you fail to provide us with renewed compliant insurance within seven (7) days’ of this email, then we will have to pass this matter to our Legal department.

 

We reserve all of our rights under the Lease and all Applicable Law.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Regards

 

 

Alya Al Ameeri​​​​

Ethics & Compliance Executive

________________________________

 

Dear Aeroll

 

Your insurance expired on 30 June 2024 and we note that we have yet to receive renewed compliant insurance in respect of the above.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet renewed your insurance, then please ensure that you do so immediately and send it to us for approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Details of your non-compliant insurance is as follows:

 

Property All Risk and Business Interruption Expired 30 June 2024

Third Party Liability Expired 30 June 2024

Workmen’s Compensation and Employer’s Liability Expired 30 June 2024

 

Please address the above issues as soon as possible and provide us with updated insurance policies for our approval within seven (7) days’ of this email.

 

Please note that you are obliged to obtain and at all times maintain compliant insurance under the terms of your Lease with us and your failure to do so may result in further action being taken.

 

Please let me know if you have any questions.

 

Rebecca

Dear Aeroll,

 

Your ADGM trade licence expired on 16 March 2024 and we note that we have yet to receive your renewed licence.  Kindly provide this as soon as possible.

 

In the event that you have not yet obtained your new trade licence, then please ensure that you apply for it immediately (if you have not already done so) and provide us with a copy within seven (7) days’ of this email.

WARNING: This Message Is From an External Sender. Should you have any doubt, click on the report button in Outlook.

________________________________

 

Dear Aeroll,

 

 

Thanks for your email however your TPL is not compliant.

 

 

The aggregate needs to be removed from the EL, also requires Additional insured, Primary insurance clause, Waiver of Subrogation and Cross Liability clause.

 

 

*         Additional Insured

 

The Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest

 

*         Primary Insurance Clause

 

It is understood and agreed that this Policy provides primary cover for the insured and that in the event of loss, damage or liability covered by this Policy which is also covered either in whole or in part under any other policy or policies effected by or on behalf of any of these parties comprising the insured, the insurer will indemnify the insured as if such other policy or policies of insurance are not in force.

 

*         Waiver of Subrogation East

 

The Insurers waive all rights of subrogation against the Landlord (GR Sowwah Retail Ltd), the Landlord’s successors, the Superior Grantors (AlSowah Square Properties LLC and GR Sowwah Trading Ltd), the Community Manager (Forty-Sixth Investment Company LLC) and the Finance Parties where they have an insurable interest.

 

 

*        Cross Liability Clause
